channel.title: Im offering free sub-domain hosting! 1st person who wants it gets it
channel.description:
Subdomains Left: 2/3
ok sorry im not offering a free domain but im offering a free subdomain so its not the great but w/e heres what u get
[anyname].rs2armor.org
these wont actually do n e thing but re direct you to some forums you make on www.rs2armor.org but n e domain u choose...
and also ull get a free hompage thats uses mysql somthing like drupal or manga (w/e it is)
What it cost:
its only cost a few things; you must make an account on my forums in which i will check every week and at the end of the week u need to have it say 1 post a day Wink
my banner will appear on the bottom of your forums Wink
i get to be admin
thats it
Also for those of you who want smf forums please post what version
Here Is a List Of Other Things You Could Have On Your Forums
[b][u]Blogs[/u][/b] b2evolution Nucleus pMachine Free WordPress
[b][u]Content Management[/u][/b] Drupal Geeklog Joomla Mambo Open Source PHP-Nuke phpWCMS phpWebSite Post-Nuke Siteframe TYPO3 Xoops
[b][u]Customer Relationship[/u][/b] Crafty Syntax Live Help Help Center Live osTicket PerlDesk PHP Support Tickets Support Logic Helpdesk Support Services Manager
[b][u]Discussion Boards[/u][/b] phpBB2 SMF
[b][u]e-Commerce[/u][/b] CubeCart OS Commerce Zen Cart
[b][u]Image Galleries[/u][/b] 4Images Gallery Coppermine Photo Gallery Gallery
[b][u]Polls and Surveys[/u][/b] Advanced Poll phpESP PHPSurveyor
[b][u]Other Scripts[/u][/b] Dew-NewPHPLinks Moodle Noahs Classifieds Open-Realty phpAdsNew PHPauction phpFormGenerator WebCalendar
